column4: [Edgy 6.10]  - has anybody succeded installing it using existing partition layout?
[Edgy 6.10]
[Edgy 6.10]  - has anybody succeded installing it using existing partition layout?
you mean by dist-upgrade? Yes, I have
I did two fresh installs recently (plus one dist-upgrade) and two times it gave me the same problem
what kind of problem?
glad you've asked
gparted doesn't let me through without creating a partition for / - root fs.
even if I have a spare partition for Edgy, it forces me to delete a partition and to recreate it - then the installation proceeds.
it is not such way that you should specify which partition will be root?
hmmmm, feels like a bug, but I honestly can be sure, have no livecd to check it out
try to report it to Launchpad
yes, I can select "/" and "/home" from the combo boxes, but it's not enough for the installer :-(
OTOH when I recreate the partition, its "format" checkbox becomes both selected and grayed out - then it goes.
thanks for the suggestion, how do I "report to Launchpad"? Just a normal bug report?
yes
www.launchpad.net
thanks, I'm already registered and reported something there too :)
so, it's time for another one (bug report, that is). Thx.
yep, earn those damn points for you :)
and provide detailed report
